meanings.sent1: This is the best cake I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: She is the best student in the class.
meanings.sent3: The best part of the movie was the surprise ending.
meanings.sent4: His performance was the best among all the contestants.
meanings.sent5: The best way to learn is through practice and dedication.

meanings.sent1: She sings the best in the choir.
meanings.sent2: He knows the area well and can guide us.
meanings.sent3: The team played the game best when they were relaxed.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed best in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The machine works best when properly maintained.

meanings.definition: third person singular present of the verb 'be'
meanings.sent1: He est at the park right now.
meanings.sent2: She est a doctor in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The cat est on the windowsill, watching the birds.
meanings.sent4: The stars est brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The flowers est in full bloom during spring.
